vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy_bonus.withdrawReward (patch_10.sol#8-15) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! (recipient.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) (patch_10.sol#12-14)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_10.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.0 (patch_10.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Reentrancy_bonus.withdrawReward (patch_10.sol#8-15):
	-! (recipient.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) patch_10.sol#12-14

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
unused-state
vulnerability_findings.message: Reentrancy_bonus.userBalances (patch_10.sol#4) is never used in Reentrancy_bonus
